original_text: and the face cloth, which had been on Jesus' head, not lying with the linen cloths but folded up in a place by itself.
korean_text: 또 머리를 쌌던 수건은 세마포와 함께 놓이지 않고 딴 곳에 쌌던 대로 놓여 있더라

sentences.original_text: which had been on Jesus' head
not lying with the linen cloths
sentences.korean_translation: 아마 포들과 함께 놓여 있지 않고

sentences.original_text: but folded up in a place
